idea:
FoodAdda, a Mumbai based food chain outlets working on quick-service restaurant (QSR) model and serves pure Vegetarian fast foods making it the most trusted and fascinating food chain outlets for vegetarian food lovers.

 

India has the highest number of vegetarians in the world, with more than 400 million people identifying as vegetarian. Approx 1/3rd population are facing a problems to find pure veg food outlets without compromising purity, taste and uniqueness in dishes. 

 

This idea of FoodAdda was propounded by Hardik Savla, Parth Mehta, and Vaibhav Patel in 2016 and then formalised the starup in 2018 incorporating a Private limited company ‘Parvaha Hospitality Private Limited’. Started its first outlet at Borivali area of Mumbai and then with growing popularity, as of now 54 outlets in operation includes franchise Outlets in 8 cities includes Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai, etc.       

         

We are the pioneers in fusion fast food category serving more than 13 cuisines international/Indian handcrafted under 1 roof with a compact kitchen size of 200 sq ft
name: PARVAHA HOSPITALITY PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Loudspeaker Infotainment Pvt Ltd

idea:
www.taramislabs.com


Our story :

At the core, we are fanatical about food, real food, that is delicious and powers your health  & fitness journey everyday. 


We don’t have supplements or magical pills. We haven’t found them maybe, because we  don't really believe in them. But we do scour the surface of the earth to find nature’s most  powerful ingredients and serve them untampered in recipes made with love. 


We are relentlessly clean - which means that we are as obsessed about what we keep out  of our foods as what we add into them. We have no hidden labels, no artificial sweeteners,  no-GMO, nothing that you need to worry about. 


We believe our foods must serve your purpose . We don’t want to confuse you with myriad  acronyms and chemical compositions. They aren’t meaningful, your journey is. We have  carefully crafted our foods so that they work for your goals, work for you. 


We want to keep our community vibrant and healthy. We partner with causes close to our  heart . So every time you give us a place in your kitchen we share that love to help someone get stronger in the face of cancer or mental anxiety. 


We understand that life can be taxing, taking a toll on your body, mind and soul. We are and  hope to remain forever, your partners as you become stronger, healthier and happier  everyday.


Who we are:

Taramis Labs is a functional foods and beverages company that was established with the  purpose of creating innovative functional foods that make everyday eating healthier. We want to partner our consumers in their journeys to get better fitness. Our strength lies in innovation across all elements of the customer experience from our formulations right up to 

the way the consumers experience our products and services using the latest digital  technologies. 


We offer our consumers tastier, cleaner, healthier protein functional foods, made from  choice ingredients, designed for their specific activities and lifestyle. 


We will scour the surface of the earth to find the best ingredients and products to bring joy  to our customers. Our products are designed with some of the most natural versions of ingredients available produced through superior processes. We are working on introducing organic Plant proteins using indigenous sources within the country. 


Taramis Labs is a young team, looking to build a diverse and open working environment that is focused on individuals pushing their own limits.
name: TARAMIS LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ZoomLearn is a one stop solution for organisations learning needs. It has a Learning Management Solution which is FREE for organisations along with an integrated marketplace for purchasing Off-the-shelf content. 

ZoomLearn is a Mobile Friendly, Plug & Play system hosted on Amazon cloud, that requires minimal implementation efforts with assured scalability. A client organization can upload users, content and can run its training calendar without any cost, in a matter of few hours.

The marketplace has readymade Micro-Learning content, in a pay per view model, that perfectly aligns training spend to training needs.
name: ZoomLearn.com

idea: GypsyGames will lead the generation of gaming in india, providing gamers with best multiplayer, fps+tps and strategy genres games developed in india itself. Company also will take on client based work in addition and will also enable young budding developers by educating and providing them perfect environment to develop the future indian gaming scenario.
name: GypsyGames

idea:
Nirbhay pharma is a dedicated pharmaceutical distribution company based in the commercial capital Mumbai.

The company aims at providing highest distribution standards and to create a network of experienced and professional management of pharmaceutical supply chain.

We target to carry out unique digital connect with the customers and gradually provide comprehensive range of specialty products targeting therapeutic segments customized to each market.

Our motive is to dispense a never like before service experience with respect to time and quality and provide a helping hand in "nurturing lives."
name: Nirbhay Pharma
